snippet: In his first year, President Obama seemed to be everywhere, talking about everything. In his fifth year, he has kept a low public profile in response to various crises.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama, in his first year, seemed to be everywhere and talking about everything, but in his fifth year he has kept a low public profile in response to various crises; shift underscores calculated presidential approach that admirers consider nuanced and detractors call passive.
lead_paragraph: In his first year, President Obama seemed to be everywhere, talking about everything. In his fifth year, he has kept a low public profile in response to various crises.

headline.main: In Second Term, Obama Is Seen as Using ‘Hidden Hand’ Approach
headline.print_headline: In Second Term, Obama Is Seen as Using ‘Hidden Hand’
